page.title: 08ST.ANDREW'S CHURCH
page.content: Butterwick Church is called St Andrew's.The vicar is called Mr. Grellier. He is the vicar of both St. Andrew's and St.James' of Freiston. He lives in the vicarage which was the headmaster's house for the original Pinchbeck Endowed School(1666).The services held are the normal ones of morning service,evensong and holy communion.Sunday school is held each Sunday at 10.30 except for the first Sunday in the month which is a Family Service.The church has a group of bell ringers and a choir.The church wardens are Mr.Griffin and Mr.Strickland. Mr. Grellier comes into school each Wednesday.The school attends church at Christmas, Easter,Ascension Day, Harvest Festival and sometimes for the Patronal Festival(30th of November).
